title: Sport and Gender
description: Intersections between sport and gender in American society. Identification and discussion of the historical, sociological and psychological issues that affect the sport experiences of males and females, especially as they relate to class, race/ethnicity, sexuality, and political movements. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for Kinesiology majors. Fulfills USCP.
prerequisites: Junior standing; completion of GE Areas A, D1 and either D3 or D4
